name: Stories
description:
"Stories" is a visual novel I created for Ludum Dare 39's 72 hour game jam. It is a "Choose your own Adventure" type of game where you talk to a loved one about imaginary stories until your phone is out of batteries.

Game is heavily incomplete! I am planning to add in both way more stories and more pictures,  but hopefully what is there is fun enough.

*Edit - Fixed some glitches that were breaking the game
